items.question: What comes next: 🔴 🔵 🔴 🔵 ?
hints: Look at the pattern - what repeats?
Red, blue, red, blue... so red comes next

items.question: Which doesn't belong: 🐶 🐱 🐭 🚗
hints: Three of these are alive, one is not
The car is the only thing that isn't an animal

items.question: If all birds can fly, and a robin is a bird, then:
hints: Use the two facts given to make a conclusion
If all birds fly, and robin is a bird, then robin can fly
